title: Large 2 bed 2 Bath 1160 sq ft W/Pool, Spa
posting_body: ['CASA DEL RIVERSIDE APARTMENT HOMES', '11818 Riverside Dr, Valley Village, CA', 'show contact info', 'Plan “A”   1160 Sq Ft', '2 Bedroom 2 Bathroom', 'Come Live at an Apartment Community you will love to call home.', 'Casa Del Riverside offers one and two bedroom apartments and TownHomes that feature walk-in closets, central A/C and heat, dishwasher, microwave, fireplace, ceiling fans and patio/balcony.', 'Our pet-friendly, gated community provides a pool and spa, on-site laundry facilities, on-site management, and assigned garage covered and gated parking.', 'Easy access to the 101, 134 and 170 freeways.', 'Featured Amenities:', '\uf0d8\tCentral Air and Heat', '\uf0d8\tGated Covered Parking', '\uf0d8\tDishwashers, Microwaves', '\uf0d8\tFreeway Access, Public Transportation', '\uf0d8\tSwimming Pool, Spa', '\uf0d8\tWalk-In Closets', '\uf0d8\tGas Fireplaces', '\uf0d8\tOn-Site Management and Maintenance', '\uf0d8\tTownhouse Style Apartments', '\uf0d8\tLaundry Facilities', '\uf0d8\tCeramic Tile and Backsplash in Kitchen', '\uf0d8\tCable, Internet Access', '\uf0d8\tApartment Features', '\uf0d8\tAir Conditioning', '\uf0d8\tCarpet', '\uf0d8\tCeiling Fan', '\uf0d8\tDishwasher', '\uf0d8\tFireplace', '\uf0d8\tGarbage Disposal', '\uf0d8\tMicrowave', '\uf0d8\tVaulted Ceiling', '\uf0d8\tWalk In Closets', '\uf0d8\tClub House', '\uf0d8\tControlled Access', 'Lease term: 12 MONTHS', 'Pet Policy: Cats are welcome.', 'Please give us a call for more details!', '$500 Deposit per pet, $50/mo.', 'per pet (2 cat maximum)', 'THE MASTER SUITE IS SOMETHING VERY SPECIAL AND FEATURES A LARGE WALK IN CLOSET, DOUBLE VANITY SINK AND LINEN LARGE LINEN CLOSET.', ' ALSO ENJOY THE VERY "WARMING" GAS FIREPLACE.', 'Located in the exclusive Valley Village area of the east San Fernando Valley, Casa Del Riverside has all you are looking for.', 'Feel the comfort in our one and two bedroom spacious apartment homes and town homes that await you!', 'Enjoy living in a quiet and comfortable community with award winning schools nearby.', 'We are minutes from the NoHo Art District and Studio City where you can find a variety of shopping, dining and entertainment options.', 'Nestled in the heart of beautiful San Fernando Valley, come home to Casa Del Riverside!', 'Equal Opportunity Housing', 'Prices are subject to change without notice.']
